thread.title: Comet domination: Grand Ledge runs past Holt
thread.title_full: Comet domination: Grand Ledge runs past Holt

title: Comet domination: Grand Ledge runs past Holt
text: Comet domination: Grand Ledge runs past Holt Brian Calloway , Lansing State Journal 10:30 p.m. EDT October 23, 2015 Buy Photo Grand Ledge's Ba Blamo pulls away from the Holt defense on his way to the first of his two first-half touchdowns at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Holt's Trent Stone (22) gets passed Cal Johnston (9) of Grand Ledge on a run at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Holt quarterback Kolin Leyrer (7) tries to hold on to the football as he's hit by a Grand Ledge defender during the first quarter of their game at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Grand Ledge was up 28-0 at the half. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Caden Evert (32) gets past a Holt defender on his way to a touchdown at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Grand Ledge was winning 28-0 at the half. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Caden Evert (32) jumps and celebrates a touchdown run with teammate Jordan Geobel at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Grand Ledge was winning 28-0 at the half. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Holt's Drew Stavischek (5), tries to hold on to Grand Ledge's Nate Lalumia (43) as he works for extra yardage in the first quarter of their game at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Grand Ledge's Ba Blamo pulls away from the Holt defense on his way to the second of his two first-half touchdowns at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Grand Ledge's Ba Blamo is all alone as he runs down the fiel for his second of two first-half touchdowns at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Holt's Kolin Leyrer (7) scrambles for a short gain against the Grand Ledge defense Friday, October 23, 2015 at Holt High School. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Holt's Trent Stone (22) looks for an opening in the Grand Ledge defense at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Grand Ledge senior receiver Austin Tyler smiles as he cheers the rest of his team coming off the field after their conference-winning victory over Holt October 23, 2015 at Holt High School, in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo The Grand Ledge football team is congratulated by the student section after their conference winning 42-0 victory over Holt October 23, 2015 at Holt High School, in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Grand Ledge running back Ba Blamo yells out "I'm the best running back in the state" after the Comets' 42-0 victory over Holt at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Grand Ledge head coach Matt Bird hugs senior Robert Willoughby after the Comets' 42-0 conference-winning victory over Holt at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Grand Ledge head coach Matt Bird talks to his team after the Comets' 42-0 conference-winning victory over Holt at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo The Grand Ledge football team raises their helmets to cheer on being conference champs after a 42-0 victory Holt at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Caden Evert (32) gets past the Holt defense on his way to a big gain during Grand Ledge's 42-0 victory over the Rams at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Caden Evert (32) trots into the endzone for a touchdown at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan, during Grand Ledge's 42-0 victory over the Rams. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo The interior of the Holt defense stops Caden Evert (32) of Grand Ledge at the line of scrimmage during the second quarter of play at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Grand Ledge won 42-0. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Malek Adams (21) tries but the Nolan Bird pass is just a pinch too high in the endzone in the first quarter of Grand Ledge's 42-0 victory over Holt October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Grand Ledge quarter Nolan Bird throws a pass downfield during the Comets' 42-0 win over the Holt Rams at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Noble El-Amin (3) of Holt gets tackled by Alex Platte of Grand Ledge in the fourth quarter of the Comets' 42-0 victory at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Fullscreen Buy Photo Holt's Amaan Payne (27) and his mother, Chereese, dance before the start of the game against the Grand Ledge Comets at Holt High School, October 23, 2015 in Holt, Michigan. It was senior night at the game, and after all the seniors were announced the moms surprised the players by dancing to "Watch Me (Whip/Nae Nae)" by Silento. Amaan Payne jumped in to dance with his mom. Dave Wasinger/Lansing State Journal Like this topic? You may also like these photo galleries: Replay
